content: CS students receive DoD Cyber Scholarships | CS students receive DoD Cyber Scholarships 2 juniors (major: Computer Science) and one graduate in Computer Science at FSU have been awarded DoD Cyber Scholarship. Selected scholars receive full tuition, fees, a book allowance, and a stipend for living expense ($25K for undergraduates, $30K for graduates) in exchange for civilian service at a DoD Agency upon graduation. Application details for DoD scholarships at FSU: http://www.sait.fsu.edu/scholarships/dod-ias/index.shtml
